statements: UPDATE products SET unit_price = 15.99, units_sold = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET revenue = 5000.00, unit_price = 20.49 WHERE product_name = 'Laptop';

UPDATE products 
SET units_sold = units_sold + 5, revenue = revenue + (unit_price * 5)
 WHERE product_id = 1

UPDATE products 
SET unit_price = unit_price * 1.1
WHERE units_sold > 50
